projects.title: Project Management Application
projects.description: At Escodeve, developed the backend of a project management app to help the company organize projects and tasks, streamline team collaboration, and track daily developer progress.
Detailed_Description: Project management application with features to streamline company workflows:
Team organization and project structuring
Task creation, assignment, and progress tracking
Daily work logging by developers with task descriptions
RESTful API built with Node.js and Hono framework
Authentication using JWT for secure user login
Type-safe validation using TypeScript and Zod
PostgreSQL database managed via Prisma ORM
API documentation using OpenAPI (Swagger)

projects.title: Multiplayer Pong Game Website
projects.description: Online Pong game supporting real-time multiplayer matches, dynamic player matchmaking, and consistent game state synchronization using WebSockets and Redis
Detailed_Description: Online multiplayer Pong game built for real-time, competitive gameplay:
Real-time communication between players using WebSockets
Server-side game logic developed with Python and Django
Dynamic matchmaking system to automatically pair available players
Game state management using Redis for fast and consistent synchronization
Smooth handling of player inputs and in-game events
Client-side interface built with JavaScript to manage controls, rendering, and server communication
Efficient session management to handle multiple active games concurrently

projects.title: Web Server Project (C++98)
projects.description: Collaboratively built a lightweight HTTP web server in C++98, supporting core HTTP methods and efficient connection management through non-blocking sockets and low-level network programming.
Detailed_Description: Custom web server built from scratch with a team using C++98
Supports core HTTP methods: GET, POST, and DELETE
Non-blocking I/O using multiplexing for handling multiple connections efficiently
Manual socket programming to manage client-server communication
Custom parsing and handling of HTTP headers and request bodies
Designed to mimic behavior of lightweight web servers (NGINX)
Developed entirely with C++98 standard without external frameworks or libraries

projects.title: Inception Project (Docker Containers)
projects.description: Created and managed Docker containers and coordinated multi-service application deployment using Docker Compose, focusing on networking, persistent storage, and container communication.
Detailed_Description: Comprehensive containerization and management project involving
Building and configuring Docker containers from scratch
Using Docker Compose to manage multi-container applications
Setting up container networking to enable seamless communication between services
Using Docker volumes to ensure data remains intact across container restarts and updates

projects.title: MiniShell Project
projects.description: Collaboratively developed a custom shell program in C that replicates essential Bash functionalities such as command execution, piping, I/O redirection, and signal handling on Unix/Linux systems.
Detailed_Description: A comprehensive shell implementation demonstrating deep understanding of operating system concepts:
Command parsing and execution
Process management and signal handling
Built-in commands support (cd, echo, pwd, export, unset, env, exit)
Pipe and I/O redirection support
Environment variable management
Robust error handling and memory management
Collaborative development focused on code quality and system stability
